text: Koo! Shololangakhwo mbu Nyasaye ayilaanga amaleesi mana akaretsanga halala, mana akakhole libunjikho? Mana olalola ifula nirula hakari wako , naye yeshinjia okhurula hekulu khutsingulu etsia maleesi ifula yamachina mana atililakho owayenya ne eyile ehale khu owayenya okhumiesukha khwelikulu khukhaaba okhuwofusia tsimoni
